nodes.text: Jedi of the Republic – Mace Windu 2

Jedi of the Republic – Mace Windu 2 is the second issue of the canon comic book miniseries Star Wars: Jedi of the Republic – Mace Windu. The issue was written by Matt Owens, illustrated by Denys Cowan, and published on September 27, 2017 by Marvel Comics.
On a planet of near-perpetual darkness, the Jedi must bring light. Mace finds both his faith and skill tested. For is it truly the place of the Jedi to go to war?
